name: Agni Kai Arena
description:
Dedicated to my sister, Carol.

Agni Kai Arena is an ATLA/ATLK fangame where you can face off your friends and rivals on the battlefield of the firebenders and show off your amazing bending skills!

You can increase your ranking by beating opponents. Will you become the master firebender of all time?!

In the next update, you will be able to costumize your own firebender character, the current ones are merely temporary!

You must set 4 skills before you can play in the Skillset menu! Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • CTRL while Moving - Dodge
  • Q, R, T, E - Skills
  • Left Shift - Run
  • Escape - Escape Menu
  • F - Taunt
Check out our other games!

Agni Kai Arena is inspired by Avatar the Last Airbender however it is not affiliated nor does it claim copyright over such, as it is merely a fangame it is not made for profit.
